sentences.sContent: He could draw men round him and keep them bound to him; while his powerful attraction was there, disruption was out of the question.
sentences.sContent_eng: He could draw men round him and keep them bound to him; while his powerful attraction was there, disruption was out of the question.
sentences.sCn: 他能够把人们吸引到他的周围而且保持他们的忠心；而他的强大吸引力所在之处，就不可能有分裂。

phrases.pCn: [经]市场破坏；[经]市场瓦解；[经]市场干扰

words.tran: 破坏的；分裂性的；制造混乱的
破坏；使瓦解；使分裂；使中断；使陷于混乱
